product.title: Dr. Seuss’s Sleep Book | Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Dr. Seuss’s Sleep Book
by Dr. Seuss

 

Make bedtime a snap with Dr. Seuss’s Sleep Book. This Dr. Seuss classic takes a look at sleep time, starting with a single yawn that spreads across the land until the “who’s asleep score” is in the zillions and about to add one more. Filled with fantastical creatures and bouncy verse, Dr. Seuss’s Sleep Book is a must for every child’s nightstand.

Tie-in Activity: If your child has stuffed animals or toys in her room, allow her to put them to bed as part of a nighttime routine. Knowing others are “asleep” might help her nod off, too!
